__e: Boy, this is a tough one. I don't know if I'm supposed to be hoping it is him, or not him.
Darling, you can't work with men for 14 hours a day for five years and not lose your girlish illusions.
I don't want you to get your hopes up that he'll be coming to the wedding. Even if the invitation got to him, I'm not sure he'd make a point of coming back for it.
Well, no, because I want YOU to get excited about it.
It's just, I was really looking forward to this New York trip.
I don't know how I ever allowed myself any illusions to the contrary,... since us poor folks don't even have the right to illusions.
If I was just his old girlfriend, then I could see why you'd get your frothy little hopes up, but..
I wanted to work with him because I thought I would get to learn how to do the tricks and the illusions, but no one on the crew knew how he did anything.
I don't even know what that is, and I don't want you to get your hopes up, but it went well.
